title: 21-12 Time Attack: Director’s Cut
description: In 21-12, anything is possible. The incredibly rare director’s cut with hours of additional footage featuring more time hopping, more aliens, and more sweet bike jumps.
quote: This truly is a 21-12 time attack. We’re gonna need a lot more hover-bikes!
altHero: a man with blonde spiky hair and futuristic clothes stands in front of an explosion and a ringed planet
alt1: the blonde man speaks with a hairy, bearded man with spiked shoulder pads
alt3: the blonde man in front of a UFO
